name: Agile Gunner
description: During the End Phase, you may rotate your {at} indicator.

name: Sabine Wren
description: After you perform a primary attack, if you did not attack the ship you have locked, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Skilled Bombardier
description: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

name: Veteran Turret Gunner
description: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack using a [Single Turret Arc] you did not already attack from this round.

name: Veteran Tail Gunner
description: After you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, you may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

name: Weapons Systems Officer
description: After you perform a primary attack, you may acquire a lock on your target.

name: Hotshot Gunner
description: While you perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

name: Airen Cracken
description: After defending, if the attack hit, you may gain 1 deplete token to perform a bonus primary attack targeting the attacker.

name: Bistan
description: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack against a ship you have not already attacked this round.

name: Suppressive Gunner
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, the defender gains 1 suppression token. After you perform an attack that misses, recover 1 [Charge].

name: Ezra Bridger
description: After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack from a [Single Turret Arc] you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Han Solo
description: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack. You cannot attack from that [Single Turret Arc] again this round.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force] and gain 1 deplete token to rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator.

name: BT-1
description: While you perform an attack, you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result for each stress token the defender has.

name: Migs Mayfeld
description: After you perform a [Front Arc] attack, you may perform a [Rear Arc] or [Single Turret Arc] attack as a bonus attack against a different target with 1 or more red or orange tokens.

name: Migs Mayfeld
description: After you perform a [Front Arc] attack, you may perform a [Rear Arc] or [Single Turret Arc] attack as a bonus attack against a different target with 1 or more red or orange tokens.

name: Tiber Saxon
description: After you perform an attack at attack range 1-2 that hits, if the defender has no faceup damage cards, you may spend 1 or more [Charge]. For each [Charge] you spend, the defender gains 1 strain token.

name: Fifth Brother
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: Greedo
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result. While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: Boba Fett
description: While you perform an attack, if there are no other ships in the attack arc, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

name: Boba Fett
description: While you perform an attack, if there are no other ships in the attack arc, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

name: BT-1
description: While you perform an attack, you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result for each stress token the defender has.

name: Dengar
description: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, the attacker suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

name: Bossk
description: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressed, you must receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

name: Han Solo
description: Before you engage, you may perform a red [Focus] action.

name: Clone Captain Rex
description: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 orange or red token from a friendly ship at range 1-3.

name: Clone Commander Cody
description: While another friendly unit at range 1-3 performs a primary attack, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Ursa Wren
description: After you acquire a lock on an enemy unit beyond range 2, if there are no friendly units at range 0-1 of the locked unit, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Ursa Wren
description: After you acquire a lock on an enemy unit beyond range 2, if there are no friendly units at range 0-1 of the locked unit, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Ahsoka Tano
description: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a {force} attack targeting a different ship you have not attacked this round.

name: Seventh Fleet Gunner
description: While another friendly ship performs a primary attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 additional die, to a maximum of 4. During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 [Charge].

name: Paige Tico
description: After you perform a primary attack, you may drop 1 bomb or rotate your [Single Turret Arc]. After you are destroyed, you may drop 1 bomb.

name: Finn
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship is in your [Front Arc], you may add 1 blank result to your roll (this die can be rerolled or otherwise modified).

name: Rey
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in your [Single Turret Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of your blank results to a [Evade] or [Hit] result.

name: DT-798
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship in your firing arc. If you do, that ship gains 1 strain token. While you perform an attack, you may reroll up to 1 die for each ship in the attack arc with 1 or more non-lock red or orange tokens.
